sentences.en: Acute liver failure can cause many complications, including excessive bleeding and increasing pressure in the brain. Another term for acute liver failure is fulminant hepatic failure.
sentences.cn: 急性肝衰竭能导致许多并发症，包括大出血和颅内压增高。急性肝衰竭的另一种类型是暴发性肝衰竭。

sentences.en: Afeter 4 weeks of jaundice hepatic energy metabolism did not recover.
sentences.cn: 阻塞4周后,肝能量代谢不能恢复.

sentences.en: Aim To examine the updated diagnostic and treatment strategies for hepatic encephalopathy.
sentences.cn: 本文的目的是检查最新的肝性脑病的诊断与治疗策略.

sentences.en: And the scarring spread to the area around the right hepatic vein.
sentences.cn: 那些疤痕已经蔓延到右肝静脉的周围.

sentences.en: Approximately one third of all patients with malignant disease have hepatic metastasis.
sentences.cn: 在有恶性病变的全部病人中,大约1/3有肝转移.

sentences.en: Clinical features common to the three patients initially include fever, headache, diarrhoea and myalgia developing into rash and hepatic dysfunction, followed by rapid deterioration and death.
sentences.cn: 这三位病人的共同临床症状是，最初发烧、头痛、腹泻和肌痛，接着出现皮疹和肝功能障碍，然后病情迅速恶化和死亡。

sentences.en: Hepatic function should probably be measured at least a few times weekly.
sentences.cn: 肝功能最好每周测几次.

sentences.en: Hepatic granulomas most commonly due to sarcoidosis and tuberculosis.
sentences.cn: 肝肉芽肿多由肉样瘤病及结核病引起.

sentences.en: In hepatic cell, is the chemical content with most content?
sentences.cn: 肝脏细胞中, 含量最多的化学物是?

sentences.en: Is the hepatic hemangioma that sends a gender more essential?
sentences.cn: 多发性的肝脏血管瘤要紧 吗 ?

sentences.en: Lead can cause a wide range of disorders, including anaemia and hepatic and neurological disorders and food can be a major route of exposure.
sentences.cn: 铅可引起一系列广泛的疾病，包括贫血和肝病以及神经紊乱，而食品可能是一个重要的接触途径。

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the diagnosis and the treatments of the hepatic trauma.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨肝外伤的诊断和治疗方法.

sentences.en: Objective To identify the hepatic protein targets involved abrin toxicity in mice.
sentences.cn: 目的利用蛋白质组学技术研究相思豆毒素中毒小鼠肝脏差异表达蛋白.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the clinical characteristic of hepatic tumour lesion.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨肝脏类肿瘤样病变的临床特点与诊断.

sentences.en: Purpose To study the mechanism of cordyceps polysaccharide on hepatic stellate cells.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨虫草多糖对大鼠肝星状细胞的作用机制.

sentences.en: The most important use of liver scanning in surgical patients is detection of hepatic metastases.
sentences.cn: 在外科病人中,肝扫描最重要的用途是发现肝转移.

sentences.en: Treatment options and goals depend on the acuity of hepatic encephalopathy.
sentences.cn: 治疗方法的选择及目的依据肝性脑病的程度而定.

sentences.en: US is an excellent tool for evaluating hepatic tumor therapeutic response.
sentences.cn: 超声是评估肝肿瘤治疗反应的非常好的工具.
